name: John Space and the Space Weed
name_original: John Space and the Space Weed
description:
Game Description

John the Farmer just tried a new kind of fertiliser on his crops, but it worked a little too well. Now a massive weed is growing uncontrollably and is taking over the entire solar system!

It is time for John the Farmer to put his space suit on and become John Space.

>> Let me know in the comment which difficulty mode you've beaten! <<

TIP: Optimise your path so that you are always aiming at the planet that is being conquered.

Controls

Play with a controller or with keyboard.

  • A/D: left and right
  • S/W: up and down
  • H/K: roll
  • U/J: control speed
  • Space: shoot

Controllers:

  • Left Stick: Left/Right, Up and down
  • Right Stick: Roll and Speed
  • R2 and L2: Shoot
  • Start Button: Retry (in the game over screens)
